text: Ara ami adesa karachi ye, apani tadera parasparika byaparadite allaha ya nayila karechena tadanuyayi phayasala karuna; tadera prabrttira anusarana karabena na ebam tadera theke satarka thakuna-yena tara apanake emana kona nirdesa theke bicyuta na kare, ya allaha apanara prati nayila karechena. Anantara yadi tara mukha phiriye neya, tabe jene nina, allaha taderake tadera gonahera kichu sasti dite'i ceyechena. Manusera madhye aneke'i napharamana.
